org.hps.online.recon

Class StationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.online.recon.StationManager

  • public class StationManager
extends Object
    Manages online reconstruction stations by creating, starting, and stopping them using a StationProcess, as well as setting up the connection to their remote AIDA trees for the PlotAggregator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  StationManager.StationMonitor
      Check the status of all station's periodically (run on a scheduled executor)

      Monitoring thread to deactivate stations where the process has died.
      private List<StationProcess> stations
      Define station list as synchronized because we do not want different threads mucking with it at the same time.
      (package private) Object updatingStations

      • stopStation

        boolean stopStation(StationProcess station)
        Stop a station. This does not remove it from the station list. The remove command must be used to do this separately.
        Parameters:
        info - The station info
        Returns:
        True if the station was stopped successfully
